relevant_findings.abdominal: Obese, soft, nondistended, tender focally on the right side of abdomen between RUQ and RLQ.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: In the right lower quadrant, there is a periappendiceal abscess with adjacent fatty stranding which measures 6.7 x 5.6 cm, significantly increased from a previous measurement of 3.4 x 3.2 cm.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The size of the periappendiceal abscess has increased over time.
